title: Embedded Trivia Game
description: A trivia game built on a Arduino Uno using a state machine design patern and a variety of different components.

title: Stock News Bot
description: A small python application that will scrape the web for up to date stock news and display it to the user so you don't miss out on any important news.

title: Small French Compiler
description: A small compiler that uses french key words to create a program that will then be compiled into assembly code.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A single page web application that is used to display my projects and skills to potential employers.

title: CSS Sorter
description: A project that was inspired by a work task. This project is a python script that will sort a css file into alphabetical order.

title: Console Chess Game
description: Built a console chess game in a team of 4 using a variety of different design patterns and best practices.
